# Dwarven Plate
## Overview
**Aura** no aura (nonmagical); **CL** —

**Slot** armor

**Price** 16,500 gp

**Weight** 50 lbs.

**Description**

This full plate is made of [[Adamantine|adamantine]], giving its wearer damage reduction of 3/—.

**Construction**

**Requirements** —

**Cost** 8,250 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 466
